results.title: The Escapade
results.brief_description:
Edward Jnr doesn’t want to end up like his father. He decides to take flight and travel the road to Dreamland, a road that will transform his life, or will it!
Music by Christopher Deane. No dialogue.

results.title: The Bittersweet tale of Doffy Notts
results.brief_description:
Everyone loves Doffy Notts the clown - he makes you laugh. But hidden beneath the layers of makeup and costume is a very different Doffy Notts - a very sad and lonely Doffy Notts.
A beautifully crafted work using 2D and 3D animation.

results.title: Awaiting re-construction
results.brief_description: Interpretative piece on the power of images, both visually and textually, and the loss of identity, particularly for women, in western culture today. Uses a combination of animation, live-action and voice-over.
